name: Gauri Khanna
body:
Greetings humans, 

Thank you for taking time and visiting my personal webpage. I am a student at Cornell University School of Hotel Administration concentrating in Services Marketing. Iâ€™m passionate about bringing ideas to life and creating value in everything I do. Born and raised in Kazakhstan to a Russian mother and a Kazakh father, I am leveraging my unique perspective to bring insights into multiple international markets.
